name: Sarah Johnson
summary: Results-driven Product Manager with 6+ years of experience launching B2B SaaS products. Led cross-functional teams to deliver features that increased user engagement by 40% and reduced churn by 25%. Passionate about turning customer insights into products people love.

experience.title: Senior Product Manager
bullets: Led product strategy for enterprise dashboard, growing ARR from $2M to $5M in 18 months
Managed roadmap for team of 8 engineers, shipping 12 major features on schedule
Reduced customer churn by 25% through data-driven feature prioritization
Conducted 50+ customer interviews to identify unmet needs and validate solutions

experience.title: Product Manager
bullets: Launched mobile app from 0 to 100K users in first year
Increased user engagement 40% by redesigning onboarding flow
Built and led beta testing program with 500+ active participants
Collaborated with engineering, design, and marketing on go-to-market strategy

experience.title: Associate Product Manager
bullets: Owned feature development for analytics module serving 10K+ daily users
Wrote product requirements and user stories for engineering team
Analyzed user behavior data to identify product improvement opportunities
